across.clue: To bring into a group, class, set, or total as a (new) part or member.
A scheme for the distribution of prizes by lot or chance, especially a gaming scheme in which one or more tickets bearing particular numbers draw prizes, the other tickets are blanks.
The manner or the amount of using; use.
Any raised flat surface that can be walked on: a balcony; a porch; a raised patio; a flat rooftop.

down.clue: A substance with electrical properties intermediate between a good conductor and a good insulator.
A part of a whole, especially a comparatively small part.
A Japanese dish made by pouring broth over cold noodles, commonly udon.
